pr_title: GEODE-7994: Refactor Native Redis Acceptance Tests

timeline.message: GEODE-7994: Refactor Native Redis Acceptance Tests

timeline.bodyText: what is wrong with doing jedis2.flushAll here? In other places you added a jedis2 call but in this one (and in the Hashes test) you removed it.
timeline.author: dschneider-pivotal

replies.bodyText: it should be removed from everywhere.  flushall is a server action that wipes all the data, not a client one, so only one client needs to do it. These integration tests are running against a single server.
replies.author: prettyClouds
